title: Looking for 3 more for 5s team.
body:
We are currently looking for an adc for a full 5s team. Only those who were at least silver last season but preferably gold. We are looking for players who can play 3 games or so as a team nearly every night. Toxic players need not bother. We are looking for a group of people we can enjoy playing with and progress as a team.

 As for my own experience I have been playing off and on since s1. I have been gold or plat every season I have played ranked with normally 100-200 ranked games played a season. Feel free to add me in game. IGN- Myoakinurface


The top and supp position have now been filled**

replies.body: Hi just wondering if you are looking for an ADC main :)
We absolutely still are. Will add you in game.
Only just saw this. Hopefully you're still keen, more than happy to play a few practise games with you guys :)
Hi! I'm a one trick sion and kayle main that can both play top/sup. Add me if you want.

> [{quoted}](name=Nickers16,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=tjZd9f74,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-02-15T07:20:41.568+0000)
>
> Hi! I'm a one trick sion and kayle main that can both play top/sup. Add me if you want.

That is not a one trick....

One Trick = One champion
Hi there! my name is Anh. i think am is the one you looking for. thanks.

im down to do it man
top main since it was not all tanks haha
